nodes.name: ApiBaseUriSet

nodes.documentation: @dev Emit this event whenever we mint a new edition (see mintEdition below)

nodes.documentation: @dev Emit this event whenever we sell a new 5 pack of cards via ETH (see buyFivePackUsingEth below)
nodes.name: FivePackBoughtUsingEth

nodes.documentation: @dev Emit this event whenever we sell a new 5 pack of cards via Fiat/Credit Card etc (see buyFivePackUsingFiatFor below)

nodes.documentation: @dev Emit this event whenever we mint a new card (see _mintCard below)
nodes.name: CardMinted

nodes.documentation: @dev Emit this event whenever the contract fallback function is called
nodes.name: FallBackPaid

nodes.documentation:

 @param _editionId The CBBC Edition ID to check

nodes.documentation:
